name: Underwater Mermaid Swimming Race Full
description:
Ever dreamed about being a wonderful creature from a Hans Cristian Andersen’s ‘The Little Mermaid’ legend? Now you have a great chance to embody your wishes into reality! Play the most unusual mermaid racing game and have fun with Underwater Mermaid Swimming Race!
Just make yourself at home and explore the greatest ocean tracks ever being this pretty creature! A mermaid is a legendary aquatic creature with the head and upper body of a female human and the tail of a fish! Join the tournament and leave all your wonderful contestants far behind! Collect every shell to reach the highest speed for your little mermaid!
Be as fast as you can and experience this fantastic feeling of free swimming! Enjoy colorful fish tails, majestic power of blue whale and funny behavior of dolphin! Feel the water like your comfortable space! Every ocean track has its own interesting obstacles and underwater rocks, so think ahead and have fun playing Underwater Mermaid Swimming Race!
Earn points for every successfully done mission and unlock all the prettiest mermaids to play for! Check two game modes – racing mode, where you should beat up all your mermaid opponents; and scouting mode, where you’ll be able to scout every corner of the ocean!
Underwater Mermaid Swimming Race features:
• Unusual mermaid diving simulator
• Wide range of beautiful mermaids to play for
• Different underwater tracks
• Check two game modes – scouting and racing
• Fantastic 3D graphics
Join the mermaid contest now! Become one of the most mysterious creatures ever and have fun playing Underwater Mermaid Swimming Race game!
